Midterm exam

The midterm exam is a 60 min in-class programming exam (open note, open book, open internet). The midterm is scheduled for April 10.

  • Sample Exam #1: html (Rmd) | data: NBA play-by-play data
    Sample Solution: html (Rmd)
  • Sample Exam #2: html (Rmd) | data: Geological Survey
    Sample Solution: html (Rmd)
  • Sample Exam #3: html (Rmd) | data: Flying in and out of Des Moines
    Sample Solution: html (Rmd)
